definition: to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father

sentences.english: I'm great. Have you finished your midterm exams ?
sentences.chinese: 我也很好，你考完所有的期中考試了麼？

sentences.english: By this time next week, you'll have taken your examination.
sentences.chinese: 到下週這個時候，你就考完了。

sentences.english: I just had one final and graduation pictures.
sentences.chinese: 我剛考完一門期末考試，還照了畢業相。

sentences.english: As 409 students filed out of their exam.
sentences.chinese: 當409名學生考完後魚貫離開教室時。

sentences.english: Intermedia Interpretation has finally been done.
The math test was not difficult. I sailed right through it.
sentences.chinese: 數學考試並不困難，我一帆風順的就考完了。

sentences.english: Fortunately, we had our term finial exam finished today, so I feel more relax.
sentences.chinese: 剛好，今天我們考完了期終考試，心情放鬆了一大節。

sentences.english: I had been worried about the exam for ages, so I was glad when it was all over.
sentences.chinese: 這次考試已讓我擔心很久，因此考完後我很開心。

sentences.english: A student collected in the papers when the exam ended.
sentences.chinese: 當他們考完後，由一個學生收上了所有的試卷。

sentences.english: After getting through CET4, I breathed a sigh in relief.
sentences.chinese: 考完四級考試，我終於安心地嘆一口氣了。

sentences.english: When I finished my entrance exams, I felt as free as a bird.
sentences.chinese: 入學考試考完後，我感到無比的輕鬆。

sentences.english: "Compared with the ACT, our math exam is very hard, " Shanshan commented.
sentences.chinese: 姍姍說，在考完數學時，自己就覺得沒有太大希望了。

sentences.english: Every Friday I will go back without waiting my result to post out.
sentences.chinese: 星期五考完考試就回家，不要等待成績出爐。

definition: to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father
to sit for a makeup exam/to resit an exam/makeup exam/resit

college entrance exam (especially as abbr. for 普通高等學校招生全國統一考試|普通高等学校招生全国统一考试[Pu3 tong1 Gao1 deng3 Xue2 xiao4 Zhao1 sheng1 Quan2 guo2 Tong3 yi1 Kao3 shi4])/(Tw) entrance exam for senior government service posts (abbr. for 公務人員高等考試|公务人员高等考试)
to sit an entrance exam for a graduate program
